sourcesContent:
<template >

<Navbar v-if="this.showNavbar" />
  


<router-view></router-view>
</template>
<script>

import Navbar from './components/Navbar.vue';
import { eventBus } from './eventBus';



export default{
    components: {
        
        Navbar,
        
        
    },
    data(){
        return{
            showNavbar:false,
        }
    },
    beforeCreate(){
        this.showNavbar=localStorage.getItem("showNavbar");
    },
    created() {
        // Login componentinden tetiklenen bir değişiklik olursa izlemek için
        window.addEventListener('storage', this.syncNavbar);
    },
    methods:{
        callGlobalCustomEvent() {
        eventBus.$emit('updataNavbar') // if ChildComponent is mounted, we will have a message in the console
        }
    }
    
    
    

}
    
    
</script>
